data.text: @UtahCoronavirus Same advice for those with natural immunity, which at this point after Omicron and all other variant surges is a significant portion of the population?  You all keep promoting a one-size-fits-all strategy, one that involves unnecessary risk for many - see the Pfizer papers.
@UtahCoronavirus The next step after getting vaxxxed is usually finding a good heart specialist or funeral home.
@UtahCoronavirus Why do you insist on lying? You need to shut this account down and stop committing crimes against humanity with your poison.

@UtahCoronavirus It is irresponsible to promote a vax that's given with no proper informed consent, is not a real vax, causes spread of Covid, ruins the immune system (VAIDS), and caused 24,000 deaths and 1.9 million injuries. Do your due diligence. You're being lied to about this (non)vaccine.

@UtahCoronavirus Stop close contact = stop COVID spread! Download free app Bost to safely communicate with people nearby. Download for free at Apple https://t.co/uChWynVbJG & Google https://t.co/Nvi0yitq3f https://t.co/MgRiET2CZv
